title: [ENH] Change Exponential Smoothing to SARIMAX in reconciler example
body:
**Describe the desired ehancement**
<!--
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.
-->
The reconciler example given by sktime does not change the predictions. It can if Exponential smoothing is replaced with sarimax.

**To Reproduce**
<!--
Add a Minimal, Complete, and Verifiable example (for more details, see e.g. https://stackoverflow.com/help/mcve

If the code is too long, feel free to put it in a public gist and link it in the issue: https://gist.github.com
-->

```python
from sktime.forecasting.exp_smoothing import ExponentialSmoothing
from sktime.transformations.hierarchical.reconcile import Reconciler
from sktime.transformations.hierarchical.aggregate import Aggregator
from sktime.utils._testing.hierarchical import _bottom_hier_datagen
import numpy as np
agg = Aggregator()
y = _bottom_hier_datagen(
    no_bottom_nodes=3,
    no_levels=1,
    random_seed=123,
)
y = agg.fit_transform(y)
forecaster = ExponentialSmoothing()
forecaster.fit(y)
prds = forecaster.predict(fh=[1])
# reconcile forecasts
reconciler = Reconciler(method="ols")
prds_recon = reconciler.fit_transform(prds)
# does not fail
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(prds.to_numpy(), prds_recon.to_numpy(), decimal=5)
```

**Expected behavior**
<!--
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.
-->

An example where at least results are changing. Replace exponential smoothing with sarimax.

```python
from sktime.forecasting.exp_smoothing import ExponentialSmoothing
from sktime.transformations.hierarchical.reconcile import Reconciler
from sktime.transformations.hierarchical.aggregate import Aggregator
from sktime.utils._testing.hierarchical import _bottom_hier_datagen
import numpy as np
agg = Aggregator()
y = _bottom_hier_datagen(
    no_bottom_nodes=3,
    no_levels=1,
    random_seed=123,
)
y = agg.fit_transform(y)
forecaster = SARIMAX()
forecaster.fit(y)
prds = forecaster.predict(fh=[1])
# reconcile forecasts
reconciler = Reconciler(method='td_fcst')
prds_recon = reconciler.fit_transform(prds)
# fails
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(prds.to_numpy(), prds_recon.to_numpy(), decimal=5)
```
